modName: Thalmor - Aldmeri Dominion Follower of Setvi - Altmer - Skyrim
summary: Add a Altmer Thalmor Follower to Whiterun Talos Shrine ; Hendil.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][color=#efefef][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][size=3]

HENDIL'S DESC:
Add a Altmer Thalmor Follower to Whiterun Talos Shrine ; Hendil.

HENDIL'S LOCATIONS:
Temple of Kynareth,
Whiterun Talos Shrine,
Heimskr House.

HENDIL'S INFOS:
Altmer,
Thalmor,
Follower,
Unique,
Essential,
Flames,
Fury,
Healing,
Lvl with the player,
To lvl 4 to 81,
No perk added,
No custom voiced.

AUTHOR'S NOTES:
The hood on the screenshot come from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69651/?]Impoverished Rogue - outfits for Bards and Mages by Tinuvia[/url]'s mod and are not included!
It's just to promote this so amazing mod!
Give it a try!
Screenshots are welcome!

DLC &
REQUIREMENT:
Nothing.

CREDITS &
LIST OF MODS USED IN THE SCREENSHOTS:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59002/?]Thalmor Influence - No shrine of Talos in Whiterun by gtantsa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53628/?]Morrowind Overhaul by adidertulpendieb[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7587/?]Height Adjusted Races with True Giants by EvilDeadAsh34 (FILES - MAIN FILES - Height Adjusted Races - Morrowind Lore Heights)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69651/?]Impoverished Rogue - outfits for Bards and Mages by Tinuvia[/url]
[/size][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/383710/?]Nikkinoodles[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url]
[/size][/b][size=3]Give it a try!
Thx!
Setvi[/size][/color][/center][/b]
author: Setvi
